column2:
G3;Trying to compile a simple C file
g

gcc.exe: error: unrecognized command line option '-std=gnu2x'; did you mean '-std=gnu1x'?
-make: *** [C:/R-4.5.0/etc/x64/Makeconf:289: foo.o] Error 1

G3;WARNING: Rtools is required to build R packages, but no version of Rtools compatible with R 4.5.0 was found. (Only the following incompatible version(s) of Rtools were found: 4.4.6459)

Please download and install Rtools 4.5 from https://cran.r-project.org/bin/windows/Rtools/.
g

make cmd is
  make -f "C:/R-45~1.0/etc/x64/Makeconf" -f "C:/R-45~1.0/share/make/winshlib.mk" CXX='$(CXX17) $(CXX17STD)' CXXFLAGS='$(CXX17FLAGS)' CXXPICFLAGS='$(CXX17PICFLAGS)' SHLIB_LDFLAGS='$(SHLIB_CXX17LDFLAGS)' SHLIB_LD='$(SHLIB_CXX17LD)' SHLIB="file142035156c1f.dll" WIN=64 TCLBIN= OBJECTS="file142035156c1f.o"

make would use
g++  -std=gnu++17 -I"C:/R-45~1.0/include" -DNDEBUG   -I"C:/R-4.5.0/library/Rcpp/include/"  -I"C:/R-4.5.0/library/RcppEigen/include/"  -I"C:/R-4.5.0/library/RcppEigen/include/unsupported"  -I"C:/R-4.5.0/library/BH/include" -I"C:/R-4.5.0/library/StanHeaders/include/src/"  -I"C:/R-4.5.0/library/StanHeaders/include/"  -I"C:/R-4.5.0/library/RcppParallel/include/" -DRCPP_PARALLEL_USE_TBB=1 -I"C:/R-4.5.0/library/rstan/include" -DEIGEN_NO_DEBUG  -DBOOST_DISABLE_ASSERTS  -DBOOST_PENDING_INTEGER_LOG2_HPP  -DSTAN_THREADS  -DUSE_STANC3 -DSTRICT_R_HEADERS  -DBOOST_PHOENIX_NO_VARIADIC_EXPRESSION  -D_HAS_AUTO_PTR_ETC=0  -include "C:/R-4.5.0/library/StanHeaders/include/stan/math/prim/fun/Eigen.hpp"  -std=c++1y    -I"c:/rtools45/x86_64-w64-mingw32.static.posix/include"      -O2 -Wall  -mfpmath=sse -msse2 -mstackrealign    -c file142035156c1f.cpp -o file142035156c1f.o

if test "zfile142035156c1f.o" != "z"; then \
  if test -e "file142035156c1f-win.def"; then \
    echo g++  -shared -s -static-libgcc -o file142035156c1f.dll file142035156c1f-win.def file142035156c1f.o  "C:/R-4.5.0/library/rstan/lib/x64/libStanServices.a" -L"C:/R-4.5.0/library/StanHeaders/libs/x64" -lStanHeaders -L"C:/R-4.5.0/library/RcppParallel/lib/x64" -ltbb -L"C:/R-4.5.0/library/RcppParallel/libs/x64" -lRcppParallel -LC:/R-4.5.0/library/RcppParallel/lib/x64 -ltbb -ltbbmalloc -L"c:/rtools45/x86_64-w64-mingw32.static.posix/lib/x64" -L"c:/rtools45/x86_64-w64-mingw32.static.posix/lib"  -L"C:/R-45~1.0/bin/x64" -lR ; \
    g++  -shared -s -static-libgcc -o file142035156c1f.dll file142035156c1f-win.def file142035156c1f.o  "C:/R-4.5.0/library/rstan/lib/x64/libStanServices.a" -L"C:/R-4.5.0/library/StanHeaders/libs/x64" -lStanHeaders -L"C:/R-4.5.0/library/RcppParallel/lib/x64" -ltbb -L"C:/R-4.5.0/library/RcppParallel/libs/x64" -lRcppParallel -LC:/R-4.5.0/library/RcppParallel/lib/x64 -ltbb -ltbbmalloc -L"c:/rtools45/x86_64-w64-mingw32.static.posix/lib/x64" -L"c:/rtools45/x86_64-w64-mingw32.static.posix/lib"  -L"C:/R-45~1.0/bin/x64" -lR ; \
  else \
    echo EXPORTS > tmp.def; \
    nm file142035156c1f.o | sed -n 's/^.* [BCDRT] / /p' | sed -e '/[.]refptr[.]/d' -e '/[.]weak[.]/d' | sed 's/[^ ][^ ]*/"&"/g'  >> tmp.def; \
    echo g++  -shared -s -static-libgcc -o file142035156c1f.dll tmp.def file142035156c1f.o  "C:/R-4.5.0/library/rstan/lib/x64/libStanServices.a" -L"C:/R-4.5.0/library/StanHeaders/libs/x64" -lStanHeaders -L"C:/R-4.5.0/library/RcppParallel/lib/x64" -ltbb -L"C:/R-4.5.0/library/RcppParallel/libs/x64" -lRcppParallel -LC:/R-4.5.0/library/RcppParallel/lib/x64 -ltbb -ltbbmalloc -L"c:/rtools45/x86_64-w64-mingw32.static.posix/lib/x64" -L"c:/rtools45/x86_64-w64-mingw32.static.posix/lib"  -L"C:/R-45~1.0/bin/x64" -lR ; \
    g++  -shared -s -static-libgcc -o file142035156c1f.dll tmp.def file142035156c1f.o  "C:/R-4.5.0/library/rstan/lib/x64/libStanServices.a" -L"C:/R-4.5.0/library/StanHeaders/libs/x64" -lStanHeaders -L"C:/R-4.5.0/library/RcppParallel/lib/x64" -ltbb -L"C:/R-4.5.0/library/RcppParallel/libs/x64" -lRcppParallel -LC:/R-4.5.0/library/RcppParallel/lib/x64 -ltbb -ltbbmalloc -L"c:/rtools45/x86_64-w64-mingw32.static.posix/lib/x64" -L"c:/rtools45/x86_64-w64-mingw32.static.posix/lib"  -L"C:/R-45~1.0/bin/x64" -lR ; \
    rm -f tmp.def; \
  fi \
fi
